title: OpenAI taps Tata for 100MW AI data center capacity in India, eyes 1GW
description: OpenAI also plans to expand its presence in India with new offices in Mumbai and Bengaluru later this year.

content.summary: OpenAI also plans to expand its presence in India with new offices in Mumbai and Bengaluru later this year....
content.impact: The implications of this tech update are significant for digital infrastructure in Tier-1 nations. Experts suggest that such developments could influence both consumer behavior and enterprise-level security protocols in the US, UK, CA, and AU markets.
